conditional_rules: IF operation == 'aggregate' AND resource == 'document' THEN SHOW parameter 'query'
IF operation == 'delete' AND resource == 'document' THEN SHOW parameter 'query'
IF operation == 'find' AND resource == 'document' THEN SHOW parameter 'options'
IF operation == 'find' AND resource == 'document' THEN SHOW parameter 'query'
IF operation == 'insert' AND resource == 'document' THEN SHOW parameter 'fields'
IF operation IN ["update", "findOneAndReplace", "findOneAndUpdate"] AND resource == 'document' THEN SHOW parameter 'updateKey'
IF operation IN ["update", "findOneAndReplace", "findOneAndUpdate"] AND resource == 'document' THEN SHOW parameter 'fields'
IF operation IN ["update", "findOneAndReplace", "findOneAndUpdate"] AND resource == 'document' THEN SHOW parameter 'upsert'
IF operation IN ["update", "insert", "findOneAndReplace", "findOneAndUpdate"] AND resource == 'document' THEN SHOW parameter 'options'
IF operation == 'listSearchIndexes' AND resource == 'searchIndexes' THEN SHOW parameter 'indexName'
IF operation IN ["createSearchIndex", "dropSearchIndex", "updateSearchIndex"] AND resource == 'searchIndexes' THEN SHOW parameter 'indexNameRequired'
IF operation IN ["createSearchIndex", "updateSearchIndex"] AND resource == 'searchIndexes' THEN SHOW parameter 'indexDefinition'
IF operation == 'createSearchIndex' AND resource == 'searchIndexes' THEN SHOW parameter 'indexType'
